page.title: 03KEYWORDS (Contd.)
page.content:
{EMPLOYMENT: Agricultural,forestry and hotel work.
{GOVERNMENT: The river Irthing is the boundary line between the counties of Cumbria and Northumberland.The west side is the Cumbria section which is in the Penrith and Border Parliamentary Division with local government jurisdiction under Carlisle City Council.The Parish Council is Waterhead. The east side is in the Northumberland section and in the Hexham Parliamentary Division,the local government is Tynedale District Council and the parish council is Thirlwall.
